Text: Halebeedu (literally "old capital") is a town located in Hassan District, Karnataka, India.

Text: Halebidu:  It is home to some of the best examples of Hoysala architecture.

Text: Halebidu:  Most notable are the ornate Hoysaleshwara and Kedareshwara temples.
